    • About Doug and Lona Leugers


    Since 2003. Doug and Lona Leugers have been leaders in Real Estate. With thousands of post transactions, and over ten thousand agents coached. They are well-regarded as industry innovators and mentors. They are the founders of Team Freedom, and have expanded their group of REALTOR partners across the US and Internationally.
